name: Chu Run Space Station
description:
///spanish

usa el mouse para apuntar y disparar, las flechas de direccion permiten moverte

R reinicia el juego, ESC permite salir de la aplicacion

se agregaron mas niveles. elaborado en gamemakerstudio

///english

use mouse to aim / shoot and direction keys to move

R restart/ESC close the game

added more  levels.

 the purple boxes upgrade your stats randomly.

developed in gamemaker studio,
